scripts.deploy: sam build --region $npm_package_config_regionName --profile $npm_package_config_profileName && sam package --template-file template.yaml --s3-bucket $npm_package_config_bucketName --output-template-file packaged.yaml --profile $npm_package_config_profileName && sam deploy --region $npm_package_config_regionName --template-file packaged.yaml --stack-name $npm_package_config_stackName --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --profile $npm_package_config_profileName --parameter-overrides $npm_package_config_parameterOverrides && aws cloudformation describe-stacks --stack-name $npm_package_config_stackName --region $npm_package_config_regionName --profile $npm_package_config_profileName --query 'Stacks[].Outputs'
